description: Drilled is a four way that will rank as a favorite scene for years tocome. Four men- Eric Evans, Wilhelm Dragon, Robert Black, andSean Steele- are thrown into a whirlpool of fisting that is both a climaxfor the film and a climax for the performers. Four guys going at it fullblast--punching, groaning, deep-fisting, stretching....the screams ofsex fill the room. But what is so thrilling about this scene is that it wasfilmed in only 3 or 4 long takes! What this means is that you, theviewer, get real-time action with minimal editing. You see this scenealmost exactly as it unfolded for our crew. Long takes running five toten minutes without any editing bring you right into the room withthese sweaty, greasy sex pigs. What you see is what reallyhappened--in short, the perfect ending to a true fisting masterpiece.This movie will become your favorite fisting film of all time.
title: Toolbox 1 - Drilled
